def transform_table_data(table_data):
    names = [row[1] for row in table_data]
    amounts = [row[1] for row in table_data]
    return [names, amounts]

def transform_table_data(table_data):
    names = [row[-1] for row in table_data]
    amounts = [row[1] for row in table_data]
    return [names, amounts]
